name: Superior Iron Man
text: Selfish Guy — Resource: Deal 1 damage to a friendly character → generate a [wild] resource. (Limit once per phase).

name: Tony Stark
text: Setup: Find Endo-Sym Armor and put it into play. Takeover bid — Action (thwart): Spend X [mental] resource (minimum 1) → remove 1 + X threat from a scheme (Limit once per phase).

name: Endo-Sym Armor
text: Permanent. Hero Action (attack): Spend X [physical] resource (minimum 1) → deal 2 + X damage to an enemy (limit once per phase). Hero Interrupt (defense): When you would take any amount of damage, spend X [energy] resource (minimum 1) → prevent 1 + X of that damage (limit once per phase).

name: Teen Abomination
text: Teen Abomination enters play with 4 rage counters on him. Forced Response: After Teen Abomination attacks, remove 1 rage counter from him. [star] Teen Abomination gets +1 ATK for each rage counter token here.

name: Daniel Hall
text: Uses (3 money counters). Resource: Remove 1 money counter from Daniel Hall and exhaust him → generate a [wild] resource. Forced Interrupt: When you would remove the last counter from here, discard 1 card from your hand.

name: Claire Mooney
text: Uses (3 money counters). Resource: Remove 1 money counter from Claire Mooney and exhaust her → generate a [wild] resource. Forced Interrupt: When you would remove the last counter from here, discard 1 card from your hand.

name: Mason Thomas
text: Uses (3 money counters). Resource: Remove 1 money counter from Mason Thomas and exhaust him → generate a [wild] resource. Forced Interrupt: When you would remove the last counter from here, discard 1 card from your hand.

name: Pepper Potts
text: Action: Exhaust Pepper Potts → remove 1 threat from a scheme ignoring the crisis icon ([crisis]). “I can see some pretty big basic-human-rights-sized holes in this idea.” — Pepper

name: Stark Island
text: Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust Stark Island → search your deck and discard pile for a [[persona]] support and put it into play paying its cost. (Shuffle your deck.) “It is built on the old Alcatraz Island."

name: Iron Sight
text: Uses (2[per_hero] spy counters). Interrupt: When a boost card is turned faceup, exhaust Iron Sight and remove 1 spy counter → cancel the boost icons on that card. “A network of drone cameras, designed to protect all of you,"

name: Endo-Sym Spare
text: Action: Exhaust Endo-Sym Spare → search your discard pile for an Endo-Sym Matter resource card and shuffle it into your deck. “The Endo-Sym armor is made of liquid smart metal that hardens instantly!” —Tony.

name: Spectacular Blast
text: Hero Action (attack/thwart): Deal 3 damage to an enemy. Remove 2 threat from a scheme. “I won't hold this little outburst against you.” —Tony.

name: Spectacular Save
text: Hero Interrupt (defense/thwart): When a friendly character would take any amount of damage, prevent 3 of that damage. Remove 1 threat from a scheme. “Do you know how to swim?” —Iron Man

name: Endo-Sym Matter
text: Double the number of resources this card generates when paying for an identity card. (including for capacities on those cards.)
